entry.value: A metanode for Uniform Manifold Approximation and Projection (UMAP) for dimensionality reduction. UMAP is performed using the umap R package (https://github.com/tkonopka/umap) version 0.2.8.0.%%00010%%00010It is possible to perform UMAP either on columns or rows. UMAP cannot be performed on data with missing values, all rows in case of UMAP on columns or column in case of UMAP on rows will be filtered out.%%00010%%00010Annotation can be displayed alongside the points in the UMAP plot. If UMAP is performed on columns, column headers will be used for annotation. For UMAP on rows, a column containing points annotations should be selected. It is possible to remove a common prefix or suffix from points annotations.%%00010%%00010Points can be also grouped so that points from the same group will be filled with the same color. This is possible to do either manually (by manually entering the group of every individual point) or by selecting a column containing point groups (for UMAP on rows).%%00010%%00010Note: any data pre-processing (normalization, missing value imputation) should be done before running this metanode!%%00010%%00010================= %%00010%%00010Used programs and tools and their respective licenses at the time of the metanode creation. Version numbers and the licenses might differ based on your local installation. Please inspect your local installation and contact us if you can not locate your local version and or license terms. %%00010%%00010KNIME nodes (The KNIME nodes consists of the following GNU GPL 3.0 License. Licence terms are available here: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html)%%00010Python 3 (The Python consists of the following Python 3 License. Licence terms are available here: https://docs.python.org/3/license.html) %%00010R 4.2.0 (The R consists of the following GNU General Public Licences. Licence terms are available here: https://www.r-project.org/Licenses/) %%00010%%00010The metanode was created in KNIME 4.5.2 running inside the docker image (https://hub.docker.com/r/cfprot/knime/), tag 4.5.2a %%00010%%00010================= %%00010%%00010This version of metanode is available under the GNU GPL 3.0 License, unless stated otherwise. The full version of the license terms is available at https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html. %%00010Version: 1.0.0 from 2023-04-19%%00010Contact person: Karolina Krystofova (karolina.krystofova@ceitec.muni.cz)%%00010%%00010More information can be found at https://github.com/OmicsWorkflows/KNIME_metanodes%%00010
